name: Santa's Blue Balls
description:
Santa's Blue Balls is one of five polishes in the "A Very Merry Aussie Christmas" Collection.

This polish is a bright blue linear holographic polish that will also glow under black light.  This polish will need 2-3 coats to become opaque

Swatches thanks to @lilyandjinks, @spookynails01 and It's All About The Polish

SHIPPING:  Orders will be shipped within 1 - 3 days of receiving the order.  

SHIPPING COSTS:  Up to 500g (7 bottles) - $8.00
                            500g to 3kg - $ 12.00

Celestial Cosmetics are proud of the fact that all our Nail Polish is 3 Free (Toluene, Formaldehyde and DBP Free), cruelty free and lovingly hand mixed.

Due to the nail polish being handmade there may be slight variations between batches, and colours may vary from photos depending on where they are being viewed.

Only quality ingredients, such as suspension base along with solvent resistant glitter, micas and tints are used in the making of all our Nail Polish.

BOTTLES:  12ml bottles containing 2 stainless steel ball bearings are used, which helps with the mixing of the nail polish and/or glitter if there is any settling (this is fairly common).  Just give the bottle a shake to fix this.

Celestial Cosmetics are based in the Outback of South Australia and are only able to ship within australia.  

For those living in Roxby Downs, enter the discount code COLLECTIONS to waive postage fees.

KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN AND AWAY FROM SOURCES OF HEAT.
DISCLAIMER: Most of the polishes are very difficult to photograph and get their true colour, and we believe you will not be disappointed in the real life version

name: Sapphires Of Tarth
description:
Sapphires of Tarth is one of nine polishes in the Seven Kingdoms Collection, based on the popular TV series Game Of Thrones.

This polish is a dark blue based multichrome polish, shifting from cyan to blue to purple.  It is not necessary to wear this polish over a coloured  base coat, but that is totally up to you.

These polishes are the result of the collaboration between Celestial Cosmetics and Color4Nails in USA.  

Swatches thanks to @lilyandjinks and It's All About The Polish

SHIPPING:  Orders will be shipped within 1 - 3 days of receiving the order.  

SHIPPING COSTS:  Up to 500g (7 bottles) - $8.00

BOTTLES:  12ml bottles containing 2 stainless steel ball bearings are used, which helps with the mixing of the nail polish and/or glitter if there is any settling (this is fairly common).  Just give the bottle a shake to fix this.

name: Little Finger
description:
Little Finger is one of nine polishes in the Seven Kingdoms Collection, based on the popular TV series Game Of Thrones.

This polish is a purple (when cold) thermal holographic polish, which turns blue (when warm).  This is a sheer polish and best results are found when worn over a base colour.

These polishes are the result of the collaboration between Celestial Cosmetics and Color4Nails in USA.  

Swatches thanks to @lilyandjinks, @tashisdead and More Nail Polish

description:
Ironborn is one of nine polishes in the Seven Kingdoms Collection, based on the popular TV series Game Of Thrones.

This polish is a charcoal grey (when cold) thermal holographic polish, which turns purple (when warm).  This is a sheer polish and best results are found when worn over a base colour.

These polishes are the result of the collaboration between Celestial Cosmetics and Color4Nails in USA.  

Swatches thanks to @lilyandjinks and More Nail Polish

SHIPPING:  Orders will be shipped within 1 - 3 days of receiving the order.  

SHIPPING COSTS:  Up to 500g (7 bottles) - $8.00
                            500g to 3kg - $ 12.00

Celestial Cosmetics are proud of the fact that all our Nail Polish is 3 Free (Toluene, Formaldehyde and DBP Free), cruelty free and lovingly hand mixed.

Due to the nail polish being handmade there may be slight variations between batches, and colours may vary from photos depending on where they are being viewed.

Only quality ingredients, such as suspension base along with solvent resistant glitter, micas and tints are used in the making of all our Nail Polish.

BOTTLES:  12ml bottles containing 2 stainless steel ball bearings are used, which helps with the mixing of the nail polish and/or glitter if there is any settling (this is fairly common).  Just give the bottle a shake to fix this.

Celestial Cosmetics are based in the Outback of South Australia and are currently only able to sell within Australia.  International ladies, please contact Color4Nails. http://color4nails.com/

For those living in Roxby Downs, enter the discount code COLLECTIONS to waive postage fees.

KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN AND AWAY FROM SOURCES OF HEAT.
DISCLAIMER: Thermal polishes are know to degrade over time and with it the ability to change colour.  To prolong the effect keep polishes in a cool dark place. Most of the polishes are very difficult to photograph and get their true colour, and we believe you will not be disappointed in the real life version

name: G & G Stuck on Blu! Basecoat
description:
G & G Stuck on Blu! Basecoat

Long Lasting, Stain Preventing and Sticky Basecoat 
3 - Free

Allow this basecoat to fully dry approx 3-5 mins. then apply your favorite nail lacquer! Don't forget to follow up with your G & G HK Girl! (For some this basecoat as acted as a peel off base coat which is great for glitters. For the majority of others it acts as a normal base coat) much of this is determined by one's body chemistry)

*if you don't allow for full dry time, you could experience bubbling* (often the biggest problem polish lovers have is that they don't allow the base coat to dry long enough), as always use polishes in a well ventilated area*

SHIPPING:  Orders will be shipped within 1 - 3 days of receiving the order.  

SHIPPING COSTS:  Up to 500g (7 bottles) - $8.00
                            500g to 3kg - $ 12.00


For those living in Roxby Downs, enter the discount code COLLECTIONS to waive postage fees.

Rave Reviews!

Check out the HEAD 2 HEAD comparisons!! 
http://www.caitlinscreativecorner.com/2013/01/holo-basecoat-comparison-and-review.html

Used G & G Stuck on Blu! under Dollish Polish Expecto Patronum. No bubbling and applied well. :) - Kristin L-Q

G & G Stuck on Blu ! - I've tested it with several holos, and they've played well together. - Jen S-W

Kept my nails from staining and kept my polish on for over 7 days with no chipping - Bridget H.

Photo Credits: www.caitlinscreativecorner.com/ 
Photo Credits: Shanel S

name: Dynamic Duo! G & G - Stuck on Blu! Base Coat & HK Girl Top Coat
description:
Dynamic Duo! G & G - Stuck on Blu! Base Coat & HK Girl Top Coat

Get the perfect base coat and top coat for all your polish needs!

BASE COAT 
G & G Stuck on Blu! 
Long Lasting, Stain Preventing and Sticky Base coat

Allow this base coat to fully dry approx 5-7 mins. then apply your favorite nail lacquer!

TOP COAT 
G & G HK Girl is a Super Shiny, Fast Drying Top Coat

It's crystal clear and has a high gloss finish 
Smooths glitters, brightens holos!

This Top Coat is 2 Free! (no formaldehyde or formaldehyde resin and no toluene)

*Always use polishes in a well ventilated area*

SHIPPING:  Orders will be shipped within 1 - 3 days of receiving the order.  

SHIPPING COSTS:  Up to 500g (7 bottles) - $8.00

Photo Credits: Caitlins Creative Corner, Lisa B, Caterina I and Babi C - Colorsutraa

name: G & G HK Girl - Fast Drying + Super Shiny Top Coat
description:
G & G HK Girl is a Super Shiny, Fast Drying Top Coat

Top 10 Reason why Glisten & Glow HK Girl is so loved!

•	 Intense shine - crystal clear formula that applies smoothly, leaving a glass like appearance 
•	Fast drying – approx 1-2 minutes often less and your nails will be dry, as time passes it will dry more within 5 minutes or so it’s rock hard! 
•	Durable, long lasting nature – customers boast that manicures last 5-7 days with little to no tip wear or chips. 
•	Holographic polishes love it! – Holos will not dull, in fact they are even intensified 
•	Smoothes and seals glitter polishes – 1-2 coats and glitters are tamed/smooth and without jagged edges sticking up. 
•	Adds extra shine to all nail lacquer – it can make a matte polish or a textured polish shiny. Cremes, jellies, crellies, shimmers, metallics etc are all left with that glossy glass like shine 
•	No Shrinkage! – G & G HK Girl top coat doesn’t cause any shrinkage 
•	Can be used with nail lacquer that is tacky or dry 
•	Even consistency throughout the whole bottle – no extra thickness or gloppyness 
•	Nail Art/Nail Stamping friendly – once nail art/stamping is nearly dry it won’t smear or smudge

This Top Coat is 2 Free! (no formaldehyde or formaldehyde resin and no toluene)

If it gets a little thick just add a few drops of nail polish thinner and shake well!

SHIPPING:  Orders will be shipped within 1 - 3 days of receiving the order.  

SHIPPING COSTS:  Up to 500g (7 bottles) - $8.00
                            500g to 3kg - $ 12.00


For those living in Roxby Downs, enter the discount code COLLECTIONS to waive postage fees.



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
Here's the Rave Reviews 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 
YOU MUST READ THIS REVIEW! 
http://www.kimberslacquerkorner.com/2013/03/lets-talk-about-top-coats-hk-girl-fast.html

http://www.agirlandherpolish.com/2013/06/sunday-stamping-inspired-by-70s.html 
I am taking a minute to include a picture of my all time favorite top coat, HK Girl. This is the only top coat I use. My designs never smear, no bubbles and no shrinkage. There has been a lot of talk about this top coat the past couple weeks and I felt that I needed to add my two cents! I have been using HK Girl for over a year now and I am 100% loyal to it, nothing else on the market comes close to this top coat! And I can't forget that the dry time is amazing and there is some serious shine! 
I order all my HK Girl from Jill at Glisten & Glow!

http://www.caitlinscreativecorner.com/2012/07/review-hong-kong-girl-top-coat.html 
Review: HK Girl Top Coat 
I have had the amazing honor of purchasing from Glisten and Glow a couple of times. Every time has been exceptionally wonderful. Today I have a rave review of HK Girl Topcoat, G & G has AMAZING customer service, her packages are packed very well, and ships really fast.

This topcoat is amazing. I absolutely love it, I have found myself reaching for it non stop, when I usually reach for my Seche Vite.

It is so great over nail art, it is thick enough so you don't touch the nail polish, but it doesn't get goopy halfway through the bottle like Seche Vite. It is super shiny, dries super fast, and overall I think this is my superhero topcoat. (I just ordered another bottle!)

KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN AND AWAY FROM SOURCES OF HEAT.

Photo Credits: www.caitlinscreativecorner.com/ 
and of course Glisten & Glow 
IG - @Coloresdecarol
